# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to enhance your daily life in numerous ways. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you for $120. This investment is sure to provide you with long-term benefits and satisfaction. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. Let me know if you're interested! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
